text: hananim-ui sa-eob-eul wihae jaemul eul bachiji anihan iyuga mueos-i nyo haneulgwa daejie issneun jaemul-eun mo du hananim-ui geos-eulo jaemul-eul bachi go seongjeonhayeo seunglihan jawa geuleohji anihan jaga gat-eul su issneunyo seung lihagi jeon-e bepulmyeo seongjeonhaneun ja ga seunglihan hue bepulmyeo seongjeonhaneun jaboda keun bosang-eul badnola modue ge bosang-eul yagsoghasyeoss-eumyeo neohuiga haenghaneun modeun geos-eul jikyeobogo gyesi nila
